body_html:
I also had this issue, using keras and tensorflow. The problem for me was that I trained my model with tensorflow 1.10 but had 1.9 on my raspberry. I only had the "Bus error" log, though
You can get a prebuilt 1.10 version for raspbian stretch from https://github.com/lhelontra/tensorflow-on-arm/releases, which fixed the issue for me

body:
I also had this issue, using keras and tensorflow. The problem for me was that I trained my model with tensorflow 1.10 but had 1.9 on my raspberry. I only had the "Bus error" log, though
You can get a prebuilt 1.10 version for raspbian stretch from https://github.com/lhelontra/tensorflow-on-arm/releases, which fixed the issue for me
